name: VapoRide
description:
What is VapoRide?

VapoRide is a retro-futuristic style car driving game where you can select your favorite vehicle and drive.

Do you want to relax? You are at the right place!

Open your favorite music, get your favorite drink and just relax...

Are you too lazy to drive? No worry!

You can select the fly game mode and fly through the city.

Do you want the ultimate retro feel?

Set the resolution and quality to the lowest and get the best retro style!

Drive until you DIE!

There is no end it just goes to infinity.

Controls: --Drive mode--

W,A,S,D or arrow keys = Drive the car

C = Change the camera

Escape = Pause menu

--Fly mode--

W,S = Adjust the speed

Escape = Pause menu

===MADE BY QEUI===
